III.ii.1.A.1.b
.
Electronic Requests for Records From a Federal Entity
VBA encourages obtaining records electronically, when feasible, and has established means to communicate with various Federal record custodians.Â  The different tools VBA uses have their own tailored request mechanisms and follow-up procedures.
The table below identifies those record types and where to find specific procedures for obtaining them.
Type of Records
Procedural Guidance
VA medical center (VAMC) treatment
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 1.A.2
outpatient treatment at a military treatment facility (MTF)
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 1.A.1.d
Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) records
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 1.A.1.f
SSA medical records
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 1.B.2
service records held by the National Personnel Records Center (NPRC)
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.A.4
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.C.2-6
electronic service treatment records (STRs)
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.B
electronic personnel records
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.C
military pay and other information from the Defense Finance Accounting Service
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.E
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 2
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, 4.C
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Requesting Evidence From Federal Record Custodians
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
